ReactorEE.pcomponents

Class Valve

  • java.lang.Object
    • ReactorEE.pcomponents.PlantComponent
      • ReactorEE.pcomponents.Valve
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Valve
extends PlantComponent
    Valve is a component that doesn't randomly fail (currently). It doesn't do anything on its own - it is used in the system to control the flow (stop the flow).
    Author:
    Lamprey
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
